title: Dip Buyers Push S&P 500 to Record High as Oracle Shares Slide
description: US stocks ended a choppy session higher, with dip buyers diving in after Oracle Corp.’s latest results reignited worries about whether technology companies can monetize their artificial intelligence investment plans.
content: US stocks ended a choppy session higher, with dip buyers diving in after Oracle Corp.’s latest results reignited worries about whether technology companies can monetize their artificial intelligence investment plans.
